name: misconnection
content:
misconnection noun
(JOINING WRONGLY)
Add to word list
Add to word list
[ C or U ] an occasion when things are joined in the wrong way, or a place where things are joined in the wrong way: Healing of this type of lesion can result in the misconnection of nerve fibres. Smoke will be piped through the sewers to show any possible breaks in pipes or misconnections.
More examplesFewer examplesThe machine must be tested for leaks, misconnections, and proper function. Any misconnections between sanitary and storm sewers will be identified.

misconnection noun
(TRANSPORT)
[ C ] an occasion when buses, planes, etc. do not arrive and leave at the right times, with the result that passengers and bags cannot go from one to the other: They said that airlines may blame one another over lost baggage or misconnections.
